title: Baked BBQ Chicken

ingredients.name: bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs or drumsticks

directions: Preheat oven to 400F (205C). Line a sheet pan with foil and set a rack on top if available.
Pat chicken dry. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Arrange chicken skin-side up with space between pieces. Roast 25-30 minutes until 160F.
Brush generously with BBQ sauce. Return to oven 5-10 minutes until sauce is tacky and chicken reaches 165F.
Rest 5 minutes. Brush with a little more sauce before serving if desired.
notes: Category: baked Source: Self-Defense Cooking (original) Interactive: ratioLock=False, heatModule=True, panicButton=True, substitutionEngine=True Self-defense lesson: Sheet-pan cooking teaches spacing, heat management, and recovery if timing slips.
